/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Power lines crisscross above, creating a network of lines against the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars parked along the side of the road add a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
